name: Recipe: Rainbow Aster
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Rainbow Aster.

value.name: Milk
value.desc: Sweet and fragrant cow's milk. Don't waste a single drop, not even that one rolling down your chin.

value.name: Lavender Melon
value.desc: A brightly-colored fruit. The flesh within transforms into food with a unique mouthfeel when cooked.

value.name: Calla Lily
value.desc: A flower that grows near water sources. When cooked, the petals have a chunky texture, yet are sweet and a little bitter.

value.name: Mint
value.desc: A refreshingly cool ingredient. The cool, fresh flavor can cut through the heat of many dishes.

value.name: Rainbow Aster
value.desc: A unique drink. Having featured in the famous light novel "Pretty Please, Kitsune Guuji?", it has since been brought to life by Sailing Breeze in collaboration with Yae Publishing House, along with its fascinating flavor. As this version does not contain any bean products, it is slightly different from the special limited edition that was available during the Irodori Festival, but this also means that there's no risk of triggering any bean allergies.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Obtained from the Event Quest "About That Time We saved the Tanuki Photo Board" (Only Available during the "Hues of the Violet Garden" event in Version 2.6)</color>
